AMIManagerSecureBoot.description: This is the root for InventoryData status information.
AMIManagerSecureBoot.longDescription: This is the root for InventoryData status information.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CurrentOtpRevision.description: This string contains the Current Otp Revision.
CurrentOtpRevision.longDescription: This string contains the Current Otp Revision.

CurrentSoftwareRevision.description: This string contains the Current Software Revision.
CurrentSoftwareRevision.longDescription: This string contains the Current Software Revision.

OTPImageCheckSum.description: This string contains the MD5 CheckSum of the currently programmed otp image.
OTPImageCheckSum.longDescription: This string contains the MD5 CheckSum of the currently programmed otp image.

OTPProvisioningStatus.description: This string contains message showing the status of the previous programing attempt.
OTPProvisioningStatus.longDescription: This string contains message showing the status of the previous programing attempt.

OtpInfoVersion.description: This string contains the Otp Info version.
OtpInfoVersion.longDescription: This string contains the Otp Info version.

OtpToolVersion.description: This string contains the Otp tool Version.
OtpToolVersion.longDescription: This string contains Otp tool Version.

SecureBootEnabled.description: This property shows the SecureBoot configuration.
SecureBootEnabled.longDescription: This property shows the SecureBoot configuration.

SocOtpVersion.description: This string contains the SOC Otp Version.
SocOtpVersion.longDescription: This string contains the SOC Otp Version.

ProvisioningStatus.description: The enumerations of OTP Provisioning Status.

enumDescriptions.OTP is already programmed: This signifies that OTP is already Provisioned
enumDescriptions.OTP is not programmed: This signifies that OTP programming was not performed.
enumDescriptions.OTP programming failed: This signifies that OTP Programing failed
enumDescriptions.OTP programming is done: This signifies that OTP programming is completed.
